dialogue.name: Watanabe-Sensei
dialogue.dialogueText: “Ha typical! All you boys are alike! You see a pretty girl and you lose yourself!”

dialogue.name: Shimizu-Sensei
dialogue.dialogueText: “Now that doesn’t seem like appropriate conduct to a teacher. What class are you in? What year?”

dialogue.name: Takeshi
dialogue.dialogueText: “Well actually I’m new. I'm a second-year student looking for a Ms. Shimizu.”

dialogue.name: Shimizu-Sensei
dialogue.dialogueText: “That must mean you are Takeshi Riajuu-Kun correct? That means I am your teacher...unfortunately.”

dialogue.name: Takeshi
dialogue.dialogueText: SHE is MY teacher? She is absolutely perfect! Beautiful face, amazing body! This year is going to be great!
